item.title: Software Carpentry Instructor Training
item.description: This week I attended the Software Carpentry instructor training workshop hosted by Elixir UK at the University of Manchester. I’ve been on one of their courses as part of the Scientist Training Programme and learnt loads. The whole ethos of improving scientific computing for more productive science is something I want to get on board with, so becoming an instructor seemed like a good challenge, as well as a boost for the old CV.
